section.p:
‘My chest!’ yells Oliphard joyfully as you hand it over.
Cross the magic chest off your Adventure Sheet.

Oliphard thanks you and teaches you how to be a better Mage. Gain 1 Rank and roll a die. The result is the number of Stamina points you gain permanently. Also, don’t forget to increase your Defence by 1 as a result of your gain in Rank.
